title: Title font in GQ magazine
content:
Hello,

I've been searching for this font for a long time.

does anybody know what it is

thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130218100126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gqfont_5130.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gqfont.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130218100126/http:/typophile.com/files/gqfont.jpg) | 47.75 KB |
author: ericquenneville

comments.content: Titling Gothic by Font Bureau. They use a variety of weights in the magazine.
